H0.text: Cells are the smallest structural and functional unit of all living organisms.

H1.text: Neutrons are the smallest structural and functional unit of all living organisms.

H2.text: Lipids are the smallest structural and functional unit of all living organisms.

H3.text: Proteins are the smallest structural and functional unit of all living organisms.

A4.text: The cell is the most basic unit of life

A5.text: The activity of an organism depends on the total activity of independent cells
